sentences.sentence: The United States has called up some 150,000 military reservists.
sentences.translation: 美国已招募了约十五万预备役军人。

sentences.sentence: He is one of the reservists who will plead not guilty when their cases come up.
sentences.translation: 他是其中一个在案件审理时将申辩无罪的后备役军人。

sentences.sentence: They have called up more than 20,000 reservists.
sentences.translation: 他们已经征召了2万多名预备役军人。
